name: Rebons
description:
Rebons is a hardcore game with unique physics. Use your agility to go through all the levels.
Compete with your friends by moving up the rating table. Be prepared to face many challenges on your way.

Features:
- Unique physical features of the figures!
- Variety of game styles, several locations and dozens of skins for figures!
- 60 levels in 3 locations each with 2 levels of complexity.
- Use the unique abilities of different figures to achieve the best results!
- Pass speed levels against your friends locally or on the Internet
- Challenge yourself to the limits of your abilities!

Features of figures:
Square - Can stick to the walls and has a lot of weight
Circle - Bounces off walls and floor and is very light
Triangle - Creates copies of itself and is used in conjunction with another figure
Star - Destroys traps, but the number of lives is limited
Octagon - Has the properties of a square and can overcome small spines

Co-op and in-game speed control:
First player (W,A,S,D) Second player ( ↑ ↓ → ← )
